Package dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.engines

This package contains the generator engines of the NG Generator API.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CDSGenEngine
    The C-Data Structure Generator Engine.
    ExtGenEngine
    The TemplateGenEngine provides functionality to run external generator from within the NG-Generator API.
    JetGenEngine
    This engine can be used to run Jet templates.
    TemplateGenEngine
    The TemplateGenEngine provides functionality to run classic template based code generators from within the NG-Generator API.

Package dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.engines Description

This package contains the generator engines of the NG Generator API. An engine is the heart of a special generator. At the moment this package provides implementations for CDS (C Data Structure), external, JET-based and classic template-based code generators. It is not intended to instantiate an engine class directly but access it via the public members of a JavaGenContext.
